titles.title: Complete COVID Collections Act
Complete COVID Collections Act
Complete COVID Collections Act
A bill to prohibit the suspension of collections on loans made to small businesses related to COVID-19, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Reported by Senator Ernst with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 8.

committee.name: Senate Small Business and Entrepreneurship
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
